name: whacked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal very tired: Here's a glass of wine, honey - you look whacked.
US informal suffering the effects of drugs or alcohol: He was whacked-out on speed, jabbering a mile a minute and making no sense at all.
UK informal strange or unusual: His story sounded totally whacked, but it was true.
